posts.post_content:
Interested in picking up some different cards of pre-war HOFers. Especially Ruth, Gehrig, Cobb, WaJo, Mathewson, Alexander, Young, etc. in lower, affordable grades. Here's what I have available:

T206 Red Portrait Cobb PSA 1: GONE

E121 American Caramel Babe Ruth Holding Ball SGC Authentic: GONE

1913 T200 Washington Americans (Walter Johnson) BVG Authentic:

[URL=http://s274.photobucket.com/user/Manderson9999/media/Mobile%20Uploads/20140423_142915_zpswdyyv5an.jpg.html][IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj259/Manderson9999/Mobile%20Uploads/20140423_142915_zpswdyyv5an.jpg[/IMG][/URL]


1940's Type I Photo of Cobb/Ruth/Speaker BVG Authentic: GONE

T206 Roger Bresnahan Portrait SGC 10:

[URL=http://s274.photobucket.com/user/Manderson9999/media/Mobile%20Uploads/20140430_150251_zpsudinoyzv.jpg.html][IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj259/Manderson9999/Mobile%20Uploads/20140430_150251_zpsudinoyzv.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[URL=http://s274.photobucket.com/user/Manderson9999/media/Mobile%20Uploads/20140430_150308_zpskxkbld4q.jpg.html][IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj259/Manderson9999/Mobile%20Uploads/20140430_150308_zpskxkbld4q.jpg[/IMG][/URL]


T206 Nap Lajoie With Bat Polar Bear GAI 1: GONE


1929 R316 Kashin Babe Ruth BVG Authentic - Trimmed: GONE
Several (as marked) are gone. Others are now on eBay.
